Exercise List:

Back
Exercise 1 | Welcome to Girls Coding

A quick introductory exercise to familiarize players with the game.

Exercise 2 | What is HTML?

Goes over the basics of what HTML is and why it's important.

Exercise 3 | Body Tags

"Discusses the body tag."

Exercise 4 | Heading Tag

Discusses the heading tags and how to use them.

Exercise 5 | Section Tags

Discusses the section tag and how it can break up your code.

Exercise 6 | Content and Structure

Discusses standard coding practice and reviews headings

Exercise 7 | Article Tags

Discusses the article tag and how it can help organize your content.

Exercise 8 | CSS and JavaScript

A quick introduction to CSS and JavaScript.

Exercise 9 | Review

A review of all material that has been covered up to this point.
